strategy: Deathwatch armies have a Strategy Rating of 5.
Initiative: Ordo Xenos and Planetary Defense Force formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on Ordo Xenos with Deathwatch allies

formations.name: 0-1 Officio Assassinorum
formations.units: Once per battle, during an Assault that the Deathwatch player initiated (after all units have finished moving), a single unit anywhere in the enemy formation(s) is hit with D3 hits. These hits counts as being from CC, and have the 'Sniper' and 'First Strike' special rules. Any damage caused by these hits counts towards combat resolution (unless the target is Super-Expendable).

formations.name: Deathwatch Kill-Team
formations.units: One Watch Sergeant, three Deathwatch Tacticals plus transport
extraUnits: Replace three Deathwatch Tacticals with three Deathwatch Black Shields: Free
Replace three Deathwatch Tacticals with three Deathwatch Devastators: 50 points

formations.name: Deathwatch Attack
formations.units: One Watch Sergeant, three Deathwatch Attack Bikes, one Deathwatch Landspeeder Tornado

formations.name: Deathwatch Assaults
formations.units: One Watch Sergeant, three Deathwatch Assaults
extraUnits: Add one Deathwatch Landspeeder Tornado: 25 points

formations.name: Deathwatch Terminators
formations.units: One Watch Sergeant, two Deathwatch Terminators

sections.name: Ordo Xenos Formations
sections.description: One Ordo Xenos Formation may be taken per Deathwatch Core Formation.

formations.name: 0-1 Ordo Xenos Inquisitor Task Force
formations.units: Ordo Xenos Inquisitor, nine Arbitrators, five Arbites Repressors
extraUnits: Add three Leman Russ Thunderers: 125 points

formations.name: Ordo Xenos Acolytes
formations.units: Three Ordo Xenos Acolytes, three Vendettas

formations.name: Planetary Defense Platoon
formations.units: Six PDF Conscripts, three Land Transporters
extraUnits: Replace three Land Transporters with three Thudd Guns or two Flakk Teams: 50 points

formations.name: Leman Russ Squadron
formations.units: Four Leman Russ or four Leman Russ Thunderers

sections.name: Deathwatch Drop Detachments
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on Deathwatch Drop Detachments

upgrades.title: Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: 0-1 Supreme Commander
items.description: Replace an Ordo Xenos Inquisitor with an Ordo Xenos Inquisitor Lord, or a Watch Sergeant with a Watch Commander

items.name: Deathwatch Specialists
items.description: Add a Chaplain or Librarian to an Infantry unit.

items.name: Deathwatch Support
items.description: Add either one Deathwatch Dreadnought or a Land Raider Crusader to the formation.
